```{r setup}
library(vectorpower)
```

This is a test of writing data to a file in code in a vignette and whether it can work on Travis CI.

```{r}
folder="C:/testing/"
if(dir.exists(folder)==FALSE){dir.create(folder)}
x=c(1:10)
y=x^2
data1=data.frame(x,y)
write.table(data1,file="test.txt",quote=FALSE)
data2=read.table(file="test.txt",header=TRUE)
plot(data2$x,data2$y)
```
